game.logic

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    The class square is an abstraction of a scrabble board placement space. square objects are used as fillers for the tabletop rows, these objects store a desired LetterTile object and have a set attribute of Integer type called multiplier. The object then allows for an easy logical operation in which the value of the LetterTile's attribute "score" is increased times the multiplier value. Additionally the class has a boolean attribute called "activeFlag", which indicates if the multiplier has been used (true for unused, false for used).
